description:
From quick evening laps to all-day excursions, the Escape Prolink Boots have the durability and versatility to tackle it all. They're generously sized for extended comfort, and the anatomic cuff offers support and flexibility.

  • Robust zippered upper sheds snow and water
  • Sanitized anti-bacterial treatment keeps inners odour-free
  • Quick-lace speed lacing system
  • Touring fit is slightly generous for long-term comfort and 105mm width
  • Classic flex pattern is designed for good forefoot flex, with stiffer rear flex to add torsional rigidity
  • Prolink soles are NNN compatible and provide a low profile boot-binding connection for exceptional snow feel
name: Salomon Escape Prolink Classic Boots - Unisex
